fields.name: Green Gates Homestay
fields.description: Green Gates is a traditional Kerala homestay run by the friendly Mathew family. Experience authentic Wayanad hospitality in a beautiful plantation house surrounded by coffee and spice gardens. Enjoy home-cooked Kerala meals, plantation walks, and learn about local farming practices. The homestay has 4 spacious rooms with modern amenities while retaining its traditional charm.
fields.short_description: Traditional Kerala homestay in coffee plantation with home-cooked meals and plantation walks
fields.host_bio: We are the Mathew family, third-generation coffee planters in Wayanad. We love sharing our home, culture, and stories with guests from around the world.
fields.house_rules: No smoking inside. No loud music after 10 PM. Respect local customs and traditions.
fields.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 3 days before check-in. 50% refund for 1-3 days notice.
fields.meta_title: Green Gates Homestay Vythiri - Traditional Kerala Homestay in Coffee Plantation
fields.meta_description: Stay with the Mathew family at Green Gates, a traditional homestay in Wayanad's coffee plantations with authentic meals and cultural experiences.

fields.name: Tranquil Farmstay Wayanad
fields.description: Tranquil Farmstay offers an immersive farm experience in the heart of Wayanad. Stay in comfortable eco-cottages and participate in daily farm activities like milking cows, feeding chickens, and harvesting vegetables. The hosts, Ravi and Suma, are organic farmers who practice sustainable agriculture. Enjoy fresh farm-to-table meals prepared with produce from the farm.
fields.short_description: Eco-farmstay with cottages, organic farming activities, and farm-fresh meals
fields.host_bio: We are Ravi and Suma, passionate organic farmers. We started this farmstay to share our love for sustainable living and organic food with our guests.
fields.house_rules: Eco-friendly practices encouraged. No plastic use. Help with farm activities welcome.
fields.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 5 days before check-in. 25% refund for 2-5 days notice.
fields.meta_title: Tranquil Farmstay Wayanad - Organic Farm Experience & Eco Cottages
fields.meta_description: Experience organic farming at Tranquil Farmstay with eco-cottages, farm activities, and fresh farm-to-table meals in Wayanad.

fields.name: Tribal Heritage Home
fields.description: Tribal Heritage Home offers a unique opportunity to experience the indigenous Adivasi culture of Wayanad. Hosted by a tribal family, this village homestay provides insights into traditional tribal life, customs, and crafts. Stay in traditional mud houses, learn tribal arts, participate in tribal dances, and hear ancient folklore around the campfire.
fields.short_description: Authentic tribal village homestay with traditional mud houses and cultural experiences
fields.host_bio: I am Bomman, from the Paniya tribal community. My family has lived in these forests for generations. We welcome you to learn about our culture and way of life.
fields.house_rules: Respect tribal customs. Photography only with permission. No alcohol.
fields.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before check-in.
fields.meta_title: Tribal Heritage Home Wayanad - Authentic Tribal Village Homestay Experience
fields.meta_description: Experience authentic tribal culture at Tribal Heritage Home with traditional mud houses, tribal arts, and cultural activities in Wayanad.

fields.name: Nalukettu Heritage Homestay
fields.description: Nalukettu is a 150-year-old traditional Kerala heritage home featuring classic Nalukettu architecture with a central courtyard. The Nair family has lovingly preserved this ancestral home while adding modern comforts. Experience royal Kerala hospitality, traditional architecture, antique furnishings, and authentic Kerala Sadya meals on banana leaves.
fields.short_description: 150-year-old heritage Kerala Nalukettu with traditional architecture and royal hospitality
fields.host_bio: Our Nalukettu has been in the Nair family for 6 generations. We are proud to share this piece of Kerala's architectural and cultural heritage with our guests.
fields.house_rules: Maintain silence in courtyard. Respect antique furnishings. Traditional dress appreciated during cultural programs.
fields.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before check-in. 30% charge for 3-7 days.
fields.meta_title: Nalukettu Heritage Homestay Wayanad - 150 Year Old Traditional Kerala Home
fields.meta_description: Stay in a 150-year-old Nalukettu heritage home with traditional architecture, royal hospitality, and authentic Kerala Sadya in Wayanad.

fields.name: EcoNest Bamboo Cottage
fields.description: EcoNest offers sustainable accommodation in beautifully crafted bamboo cottages. Built using eco-friendly materials and powered by solar energy, this homestay is perfect for environmentally conscious travelers. The host, Priya, is an environmental activist who conducts workshops on sustainability, permaculture, and zero-waste living.
fields.short_description: Eco-friendly bamboo cottages with solar power and sustainability workshops
fields.host_bio: I'm Priya, passionate about sustainable living and environmental conservation. EcoNest is my dream project to promote eco-tourism in Wayanad.
fields.house_rules: Strictly eco-friendly practices. No plastic. Carry reusable bottles. Participate in waste segregation.
fields.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 5 days before check-in. 40% refund for 2-5 days.
fields.meta_title: EcoNest Bamboo Cottage Wayanad - Sustainable Eco-Friendly Homestay
fields.meta_description: Stay sustainably at EcoNest with bamboo cottages, solar power, and eco-workshops in Wayanad. Perfect for eco-conscious travelers.
